content: वनिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Worshipping. {@--2@} Desiring. {@--3@} Giving, bestowing. {@--4@} A bounding in water. {@--5@} Living in a forest, {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A tree. {@--2@} The Soma plant. {@--3@} A Brāhmaṇa in the third stage of his life, a Vānaprastha, <ab>q. v.</ab>
